THE MAKERS

Where Heritage Meets Innovation

Founded as a strategic partnership, our factory represents the perfect synthesis of Saudi Arabia's architectural excellence and China's manufacturing prowess. We don't just manufacture doors ‚Äî we create experiences that transform ordinary spaces into extraordinary rooms.

Located in the industrial heart of Riyadh with a sister facility in Guangzhou, China, our dual-location manufacturing model allows us to blend traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge automation ‚Äî something only a handful of door manufacturers worldwide can claim.

Our Vision

To become the most trusted name in the Middle East for high-end interior and exterior doors, setting new benchmarks for sustainable production, innovative design, and uncompromising quality.

Our Mission

To deliver world-class wooden door solutions that seamlessly merge Saudi architectural heritage with cutting-edge manufacturing processes ‚Äî ensuring every project, regardless of scale, receives the highest standard of craftsmanship.
